title: Add more stuff to gitignore
message:
Add more stuff to gitignore

Mostly Android Studio project files and GLM docs.

title: Show a textured spinning cube instead of the game level
message:
Show a textured spinning cube instead of the game level

This will slowly evolve into the game maze. To achieve this, there were
a few notable changes:
- regressed the plugin to 0.2.0 (a somewhat safe version, IMHO)
- updated package for native methods
- changed the way textures are loaded, so more than one are transported
to native-land (but still only one is sent to the GPU)
